update program_entering
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
program_type = #{programType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wx_new = #{wxNew,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wx_active = #{wxActive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wx_visit = #{wxVisit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recharge = #{recharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ad_revenue = #{adRevenue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where wx_date = #{wxDate,jdbcType=DATE} and wx_appid = #{wxAppid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO program_entering(wx_date, wx_appid, product_name,program_type, wx_new, wx_active, wx_visit, recharge, ad_revenue, wx_video_income,wx_banner_income, active_up, wx_share_user, wx_share_count, wx_share_rate, wx_remain2, wx_avg_login, wx_avg_online) VALUES
(#{item.wxDate},#{item.wxAppid},#{item.productName},#{item.programType},#{item.wxNew},#{item.wxActive}, #{item.wxVisit},#{item.recharge},#{item.adRevenue},#{item.wxVideoIncome},#{item.wxBannerIncome},#{item.activeUp}, #{item.wxShareUser},#{item.wxShareCount}, #{item.wxShareRate},#{item.wxRemain2},#{item.wxAvgLogin},#{item.wxAvgOnline})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE product_name = values(product_name), program_type = values(program_type), wx_new = values(wx_new), wx_active = values(wx_active), wx_visit = values(wx_visit), recharge = values(recharge), ad_revenue = values(ad_revenue), wx_video_income = values(wx_video_income), wx_banner_income = values(wx_banner_income), active_up = values(active_up), wx_share_user = values(wx_share_user), wx_share_count = values(wx_share_count), wx_share_rate = values(wx_share_rate), wx_remain2 = values(wx_remain2), wx_avg_login = values(wx_avg_login), wx_avg_online = values(wx_avg_online)
